alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 1:08PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Charlotte, southern DeSoto, northwestern Lee and southeastern Sarasota Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 108 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Babcock Ranch to 8 miles north of Cape Coral to 9 miles west of Pineland. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, North Port, Punta Gorda, Arcadia, Port Charlotte, Matlacha, Babcock Webb Wma, Pine Island Center, Southeast Arcadia, Babcock Ranch, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Charlotte County Airport, Pineland, Burnt Store Marina, Murdock, Nocatee, El Jobean, Harbour Heights, Cleveland and Warm Mineral Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota
